mapper.sql: id, username, operation, method, params, time, ip, ip_info as "ipInfo", create_time as "createTime"
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_log WHERE create_time <= CONCAT(#{queryTime},' 23:59:59') and create_time >= CONCAT(#{queryTime},' 00:00:00')

SELECT tbr.count AS visitCount, tbl._date AS time FROM ( SELECT @s := @s + 1 AS _index, DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( #{endTime}, INTERVAL @s DAY),'%Y-%m-%d' ) AS _date FROM information_schema.TABLES, ( SELECT @s := - 1 ) temp ) AS tbl LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(*) as count, DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS timeDate FROM user_log
AND ( username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nameOrDesc}, '%') OR operation LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nameOrDesc}, '%') )
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') ) AS tbr ON tbl._date = tbr.timeDate ORDER BY tbl._date DESC limit 15
